body:
The post that was so offensive it had to be kicked by captainmetafaggot: https://ruqqus.com/+TheGreatReset/post/655t/calling-on-all-gms-in-protest

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/2ud

"The admins are censoring us. They lie to us about them censoring us. Then they tell us it's our fault.

Know this admins, your site is going to shit. And only you will be left to blame. You don't believe in free speech. You believe censorship is necessary and roll out more of it incrementally with every update. You are admins who abuse their users, even in the official guild +Ruqqus with exiles for criticism. You have become what you've sought to destroy. 

You are the censor."

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/ldb8/uNGxHuNOw00)

You believe censorship is necessary and roll out more of it incrementally with every update. You are admins who abuse their users, even in the official guild +Ruqqus with exiles for criticism. You have become what you've sought to destroy.

You are the censor."

body:
[Lol, captainmeta4 kicked this post, yanked it back, exiled you, then kicked it again](https://web.archive.org/web/20201228020832/https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log).

Edit: By the way, only the first 3 users who are mentioned in a comment will get notifications.

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/ldjg/jioNj5O5n8M)

body:
[Nice](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/61gx/the-rcp-is-actually-lame-the)! The admins still haven't banned me yet though. What a shame. Well, the upside is that I still get to go on their guilds to complain about (i.e. "give feedback on") the changes they make to the site.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
